pull.title: build: fix qt5.7 build under macOS
pull.body:
Fixes #8237

OBJCXX's std flags don't get defined by our cxx macro. Rather than hard-coding
to c++11, just force OBJCXX to be the same as CXX unless the user specified
otherwise.

Untested with qt 5.7, so it'd be helpful if @fanquake or @morcos could confirm that this actually fixes before merging.

events.message:
build: fix qt5.7 build under macOS

OBJCXX's std flags don't get defined by our cxx macro. Rather than hard-coding
to c++11, just force OBJCXX to be the same as CXX unless the user specified
otherwise.

events.body:
this appears to work for me
thanks!

tACK

Compiled using Xcode 8.1 under macOS 10.12.1 and a `brew`ed Qt 5.7. Compiled cleanly, other than some unrelated deprecation warnings and some third-party code that's not totally clean.
Is this a bug fix, that needs backport?
